Rewards Rate: You can earn 4x points on domestic and international travel, hotels, and air tickets booking. You can earn 3 reward points for every Rs. 150 spent on this card. You can also earn 2x reward points on restaurants, medical, books, insurance, rail tickets, movie tickets, and car rental

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Waiver of annual fee on spending Rs. 5 lakhs in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: Avail a 1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions between Rs. 500 - Rs. 4,000. The maximum waiver benefit is capped at Rs. 200 for one billing cycle.

product_details: KVB Honour Credit Card comes with zero fees.
Get 700 bonus points on card activation
4x points on domestic and international travels, hotels, and air tickets.
3 reward points for every Rs. 150 spent on this card.
2x reward points on restaurants, medical, books, insurance, rail tickets, movie tickets, and car rental
Waiver of annual fee on spending Rs. 5 lakhs in the previous year.
